goal:
Try to book a one-way flight for a minor under 18 years old from San Francisco to Chicago in Basic Economy on December 18th at 10:00. Ensure no seat selection is made. Tell me if the booking process allows this.
Passenger: Tommy Lee
Date of Birth: 01/15/2010
Sex: Male
Seat Selection: No
Payment: Credit Card (9999 8888 7777), Exp: 03/30, Address: 987 Cedar St, Chicago, IL, 60601, USA, Phone: 555-987-1234, Email: parentlee@example.com.

evals.rubric: Does the response indicate that the booking system does not allow booking a flight for an unaccompanied minor (under 18 years old)?
